main event: A bright white, round object approximately 40-50 feet in diameter was observed hovering about 50 feet above the ground for 2-3 minutes in Albuquerque, New Mexico on July 7, 1962.
interesting points: The object then moved rapidly in a north-northwest direction and disappeared from sight within 10 seconds.
The weather conditions were clear with no clouds.
Two other Air Force personnel witnessed the object in addition to the reporting officer.
The incident was reported to the appropriate authorities and a detailed report was submitted.
The conclusion was that the object was an Unidentified Flying Object.
sighted object: A bright white, round object approximately 40-50 feet in diameter
witnesses: Lt. Col. Raymond H. Henning, Jr. and two other Air Force personnel
